document_data.name: ''Maelstrom's Mesh''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Maelstrom's Mesh''''' was a set of [[enchanted]] [[light armor]] crafted by a [[sorcerer]] named [[Maelstrom (sorcerer)|Maelstrom]].
document_data.Powers: ''Maelstrom's Mesh'' possessed a simple ''+1'' defensive enchantment. The armor was embedded with countless paralyzing [[spider]] [[poison]] glands that discharged the effects of a ''[[hold person]]'' [[spell]] when the wearer of the armor suffered damage.
document_data.History: ''Maelstrom's Mesh'' was among the items ensorcelled with nasty surprises by Maelstrom sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The light armor was created for the sorcerer's employer at the time. Since then, ''Maelstrom's Mesh'' changed many hands. As of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, ''Maelstrom's Mesh'' was worn by [[Mordecai]], the foul-tempered cheating proprietor of [[the Track]] in [[Westgate]].
